Beschreibung
org.apache.turbine.services.localization
Localization related services and pull tools

  • Verwendungen von RundataLocalizationInterface in org.apache.turbine.services.localization

    Klassen in org.apache.turbine.services.localization, die RundataLocalizationInterface implementieren
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    class 
    RundataLocalizationService
    Instead of reading first the accept-language header in a http request, instead this method read the user.getTemp("locale") from the RunData to obtain the language choice by the user without the browser language rule.
